mapper.update:
update tbl_customer_remark
noteContent = #{notecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR},
editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR},
editFlag = #{editflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_customer_remark set noteContent = #{notecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editFlag = #{editflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_customer_remark (id, noteContent, createBy, createTime,editFlag, customerId,editTime,editBy) values
(#{remark.id},#{remark.noteContent},#{remark.createBy},#{remark.createTime},#{remark.editFlag},#{remark.customerId},#{remark.editTime},#{remark.editBy})
mapper.select: select c.id,c.noteContent,u1.name as createBy,c.createTime,c.editFlag,cs.name as customerId,c.editTime,u2.name as editBy from tbl_customer_remark c join tbl_customer cs on cs.id = c.customerId join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = c.createBy join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.editBy where cs.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer_remark (id, noteContent, createBy, createTime,editFlag, customerId,editTime,editBy) values(#{id}, #{noteContent}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},#{editFlag}, #{customerId},#{editTime},#{editBy})
mapper.select: select c.id,c.noteContent,u1.name as createBy,c.createTime,c.editFlag,cs.name as customerId,c.editTime,u2.name as editBy from tbl_customer_remark c join tbl_customer cs on cs.id = c.customerId join tbl_user u1 on u1.id = c.createBy join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = c.editBy where c.id = #{id}
